thread.title: Govt makes Aadhaar mandatory for receiving subsidised foodgrains from PDS shops
thread.title_full: Govt makes Aadhaar mandatory for receiving subsidised foodgrains from PDS shops

title: Govt makes Aadhaar mandatory for receiving subsidised foodgrains from PDS shops
text:
Now, Aadhaar is mandatory for receiving subsidised foodgrains from PDS shops By Rd. Alexander | Last Updated: Thursday, February 9, 2017 - 17:53 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: The government on Thursday made the Aadhaar card compulsory for all those receiving subsidised foodgrains from public distribution system (PDS) shops. 
However, for those without Aadhaar card, the government has given them time till June 30 to get it in order to avail the subsidised foodgrains under the food law.
